note.p: Daughter of James Macaulay Higginson. Married Charles Henry Higginson of Springmount, county Antrim, in 1860.
Ireland, civil registration marriages index, deaths index 1845–1958 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 October 2022)
The National Archives: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland, Introduction: Higginson papers November 2007, http://www.proni.gov.uk/ (accessed 6 May 2008)
